name: The doll
description:
【Perform the ritual with the doll, and you'll become happy.】



Lucy bought an exquisite large doll at a low price.
The doll comes with instructions in the package - "Doll's Happiness Magic".
She'll become happy if she combs its hair and talks to it!
Lucy follows the instructions cheerfully.
However, it's not a happy life waiting for her in the future.
It's an endless nightmare...

★A visual novel with two endings
★A story of more than 4000 words
★Doll animated charecter*1
★Monster animated CG*1, ending CG*2

★Jump scare
★Frightening guts images
★Depressing and dark description

Hello, I'm Can-Yue (C.moon), a Taiwanese.
I'm running an independent game studio - Dark Light Studio, developing indie games.(｡・ω・｡)
